actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority relating to emergency school aid (deferral No. D75-160) which was proposed by the President in his special message of April 18, 1975, transmitted to the Congress under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Disapproves the deferral of budget authority relating to emergency school aid (deferral numbered D-75-160) which was proposed by the President in his special message of April 18, 1975, transmitted to the Congress under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority relating to emergency school aid (deferral No. D75-160) which was proposed by the President in his special message of April 18, 1975, transmitted to the Congress under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
